description:
Wow! Charley was a lot of fun!
He told us that he likes to experiment with cumming. He likes to try new places and positions, and he likes to vary the way he cums.
Of course, we were going to take advantage that!
“I usually like to cum on myself,” he explained after we had gotten him naked.
“Ever shoot into your own mouth?”
“Oh, yeah!” he said. “That’s one of my favorite things to do!”
And as he demonstrated I thought to myself: He looks really innocent, but looks can be deceiving!
title: Charley
